name: mobicent/jollof
description: This is a lighweight PHP framework for developers who love smart work

suggest.aws/aws-sdk-php: Optionally required to use the [Request] components' upload functionality (~2.3).

suggest.guzzlehttp/guzzle: Required to use the Mailgun drivers for the [Comms] components' mailing functionality (~5.0).

suggest.twilio/sdk: Required to use the [Comms] components' mobile calls/messaging functionality (~5.2)
